definition: to feel with the hand/to touch/to stroke/to grope/to steal/to abstract

sentences.english: The beggar goes out to seek for food. He won't come back for a while.
sentences.chinese: 乞丐出去尋摸喫的了，估計一時半會回不來。

sentences.english: When there seems to be no hope, dare to find some.
sentences.chinese: 當沒有希望，敢於尋摸些來。
